insert into t_information (id, time, column_key, title, source_from, keywords, order_time, read_count, support_count, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, show_time, is_use, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{columnKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supportCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_information set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, column_key = #{columnKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_from = #{sourceFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, read_count = #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, support_count = #{supportCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_resolution = #{imageResolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_size = #{imageSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_format = #{imageFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_time = #{showTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, column_key, title, source_from, keywords, order_time, read_count, support_count, image_url, image_resolution, image_size, image_format, show_time, is_use, content from t_information where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
